description: T.1 Cedar - 2.5-3m Lateral reduction & reshape of upper canopy toward parent property and removal of lower secondary limbs at approx 6m from ground level, crown lifting so that the canopy begins just above the height of the adjacent 3rd floor window.
decision_conditions: T.1 Cedar - 2m Lateral reduction & reshape of upper canopy toward parent property and removal of lower secondary limbs at approx 6m from ground level, crown lifting so that the canopy begins just above the height of the adjacent 3rd floor window. Natural shape of portion to be preserved via sympathetic reshaping.
